Title: Relates to the recall of class B firefighting foam that contains intentionally added PFAS
Summary: Requires a manufacturer that produced, sold, or distributed a class B firefighting foam that contains intentionally added PFAS to recall all of the product within two years.
LawCode: Amd ยง391-u, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the recall of class B firefighting foam that contains intentionally added PFAS
